Date: Friday, 1/31/1983
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Clifford Zayas

Date: Wednesday, 4/2/1983
Subject: Carlos Olivas failed learning new position
Carlos Olivas doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director

Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
LF David Plank
in return for

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Halifax GM

Larry Williams
